name: Trans Pyre
description:
Submitted to June  #RainbowJam 2018

In Trans Pyre you're a trans person in Finland, about to perform some summer solstice gender magic.

I got the idea for this game on the day after Juhannus 2018, while brainstorming name ideas for a different game. Six hours later, Trans Pyre existed.

Made with Twine SugarCube 2.21.0
